pages.text: The Labyrinth is a giant maze, with twistable walls, hidden pathways, a grove of warping trees, and secrets to find!$(br2)Your goal is to explore and hopefully reach $(l:blessbane/center)the center$() of the maze to rescue the mayor!$(br2)... and maybe some more secrets

pages.title: The Labyrinth
pages.text: $(o)A multitude of secrets await! Be sure to avoid the §4§mMinotaur§r...$()
